name: Hourglass of Snow
description:
Welcome to Hourglass of Snow.

A noncanonical Visual novel set within the World of Darkness, made for the Vampire: the Masquerade Jam 2022.

Story

One fateful Hanoi night, An, a kind-hearted nurse, along with her fiancée Linh, drive deep within the bowels of an arctic snowstorm - neither survive. Yet as the last ember of warmth departs An’s flesh, the arrival of Kara, an enigmatic stranger, heralds a resurrection. Embraced in violation of the third tradition, An is unwittingly drawn into a lethal quagmire of Sect infighting and plotting.

Will An survive the night's events, or perish once more, a sacrificial pawn within a game she knows not the rules to? Even if An should survive, what toll will it take upon her eternal soul?

Features

  • A branching path, allowing you to determine An’s fate
  • Four Kindred to meet
  • A plethora of hand drawn stylized art
  • Over eight thousand words
